bitmark:
[.match:bitmark--&audio]
|| There are invisible spaces at the end of the match keys, and the ANTLR parser does not strip them ||
[@id:301924]
[%I]
[!Listen to four airport announcements. Match the announcements (1–4) to the information (a–d).]
[&audio:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/ef/unit_1/web-resources/audio/b1_1_1_6_i.mp3]
===
a. information about what will happen to luggage left alone
==
4
===
b. final information about a flight that is boarding
==
3
===
c. new information about a gate
==
2
===
d. information for passengers before they board
==
1
===

pairs.key: a. information about what will happen to luggage left alone
b. final information about a flight that is boarding
c. new information about a gate
d. information for passengers before they board

bit.instruction: Listen to four airport announcements. Match the announcements (1–4) to the information (a–d).
